Open positions

We are always looking for new group members with passion, talent, and grit!

Current open positions

You find the current job openings here: Postgraduate, Undergraduate student.

Applications for Postgraduate

If you are interested in working with us as a Postgraduate student, please send me an email (gqliu1010@163.com). State briefly why you are interested and attach a CV, including information about the grades you had as an undergraduate. No need for a separate cover letter or certificates. Important: please insert “Application Postgraduate” in the subject line. If you are applying to a specific advertisement, note this in your email.

Bsc / Master students

If you are a undergraduate or a Master student looking for a project, contact me (or any group member) per email or stop by my office.

Visiting students and scholars

If you are a student or a scholar from other universities and interested in joining our group as a visiting student/scholar, please send me an email.
